issue.title: Undefined references to methods in libmcbits.a
issue.body:
When building on master with `kex_code_mcbits` enabled, the static library `libmcbits.a` appears to be empty. To be precise, the object files inside the static library contain no references to the functions declared in `kex_code_mcbits.h`.

Build steps:
```
autoreconf -i
./configure --enable-kex_code_mcbits
make clean
make
```

Suspicious or irregular output from build:
[config.log](https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs/files/2363240/config.log)
```
.
.
config.status: creating config.h
config.status: executing libtool commands
rm: cannot remove './confSR8j5r/defines.awk': Text file busy 
```
```

Making all in src/crypto/sha3
make[2]: Entering directory '/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/src/crypto/sha3'
/bin/bash ../../../libtool  --tag=CC   --mode=compile gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I../../..    -std=gnu11 -Wall -Wextra -Werror  -Wimplicit -Wunused -Wcomment -Wchar-subscripts -Wuninitialized  -Wshadow -Wformat-security -Wwrite-strings  -Wno-missing-braces -Wno-missing-field-initializers -g  -fPIC  -fvisibility=hidden  -I/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/include -I.  -O3  -fomit-frame-pointer  -maes -msse2  -DCONSTANT_TIME  -g -O2  -mmmx -mpopcnt -msse -msse2 -msse3 -mavx -mavx2 -c -o sha3.lo sha3.c
libtool: compile:  gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I../../.. -std=gnu11 -Wall -Wextra -Werror -Wimplicit -Wunused -Wcomment -Wchar-subscripts -Wuninitialized -Wshadow -Wformat-security -Wwrite-strings -Wno-missing-braces -Wno-missing-field-initializers -g -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -I/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/include -I. -O3 -fomit-frame-pointer -maes -msse2 -DCONSTANT_TIME -g -O2 -mmmx -mpopcnt -msse -msse2 -msse3 -mavx -mavx2 -c sha3.c -o sha3.o
/bin/bash ../../../libtool  --tag=CC   --mode=link gcc -std=gnu11 -Wall -Wextra -Werror  -Wimplicit -Wunused -Wcomment -Wchar-subscripts -Wuninitialized  -Wshadow -Wformat-security -Wwrite-strings  -Wno-missing-braces -Wno-missing-field-initializers -g  -fPIC  -fvisibility=hidden  -I/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/include -I.  -O3  -fomit-frame-pointer  -maes -msse2  -DCONSTANT_TIME  -g -O2  -mmmx -mpopcnt -msse -msse2 -msse3 -mavx -mavx2   -o libsha3.la  sha3.lo
libtool: link: ar cru .libs/libsha3.a  sha3.o
ar: `u' modifier ignored since `D' is the default (see `U')
libtool: link: ranlib .libs/libsha3.a
ranlib: unable to rename '.libs/libsha3.a'; reason: Operation not permitted
Makefile:380: recipe for target 'libsha3.la' failed
make[2]: *** [libsha3.la] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory '/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/src/crypto/sha3'
Makefile:673: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs'
Makefile:539: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

Trying to compile a C source file against liboqs fails, as the liboqs static library wasn't created. Moreover, libmcbits appears to be empty.

```
vagrant@ubuntu-xenial:/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs$ cd src/kex_code_mcbits/.libs/
vagrant@ubuntu-xenial:/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/src/kex_code_mcbits/.libs$ ar -vx libmcbits.a
x - libmcbits_la-operations.o
x - libmcbits_la-kex_code_mcbits.o
vagrant@ubuntu-xenial:/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/src/kex_code_mcbits/.libs$ nm libmcbits
libmcbits.a                     libmcbits.la                    libmcbits_la-kex_code_mcbits.o  libmcbits_la-operations.o
vagrant@ubuntu-xenial:/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/src/kex_code_mcbits/.libs$ nm libmcbits_la-kex_code_mcbits.o
vagrant@ubuntu-xenial:/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/src/kex_code_mcbits/.libs$ nm libmcbits_la-operations.o
```

As you can see in the last section, `nm `produces no output on the mcbits object files. Whereas for a different algorithm e.g. new_hope:

```
vagrant@ubuntu-xenial:/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/src/kex_rlwe_newhope/.libs$ ar -vx libnewhope.a
x - kex_rlwe_newhope.o
vagrant@ubuntu-xenial:/home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/src/kex_rlwe_newhope/.libs$ nm kex_rlwe_newhope.o
00000000000004e0 t f
                 U _GLOBAL_OFFSET_TABLE_
0000000000000a10 t keygen
                 U malloc
0000000000000000 t ntt
0000000000001030 T OQS_KEX_rlwe_newhope_alice_0
00000000000011b0 T OQS_KEX_rlwe_newhope_alice_1
0000000000000790 T OQS_KEX_rlwe_newhope_alice_priv_free
0000000000001800 D oqs_kex_rlwe_newhope_bitrev_table
00000000000010d0 T OQS_KEX_rlwe_newhope_bob
0000000000000750 T OQS_KEX_rlwe_newhope_free
0000000000001240 T OQS_KEX_rlwe_newhope_new
0000000000001000 D oqs_kex_rlwe_newhope_omegas_inv_montgomery
0000000000001400 D oqs_kex_rlwe_newhope_omegas_montgomery
0000000000000800 D oqs_kex_rlwe_newhope_psis_bitrev_montgomery
0000000000000000 D oqs_kex_rlwe_newhope_psis_inv_montgomery
                 U OQS_MEM_insecure_free
                 U OQS_MEM_secure_free
                 U OQS_SHA3_sha3256
                 U OQS_SHA3_shake128_absorb
                 U OQS_SHA3_shake128_squeezeblocks
0000000000000180 t poly_frombytes
0000000000000350 t poly_getnoise
0000000000000450 t poly_invntt
0000000000000400 t poly_ntt
0000000000000220 t poly_tobytes
0000000000000910 t poly_uniform
0000000000000540 t rec
00000000000007b0 t shareda
0000000000000ba0 t sharedb
                 U __stack_chk_fail
```

After disabling all algorithms except kex-code-mcbits and rerunning make clean and make, liboqs was created. However, compiling against libmcbits produces this error:

```
gcc -O2 -Wall -Wextra -I /home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/include -L /home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/.libs/ -L /
home/Shared_Folder/liboqs/src/kex_code_mcbits/.libs/ minimal_kex_oqs.c -o minimal_kex_oqs -loqs -lmcbits

```
```
/tmp/ccUmexG9.o: In function `main':
minimal_kex_oqs.c:(.text.startup+0x80): undefined reference to `OQS_KEX_code_mcbits_new'
minimal_kex_oqs.c:(.text.startup+0xca): undefined reference to `OQS_KEX_code_mcbits_alice_0'
minimal_kex_oqs.c:(.text.startup+0x114): undefined reference to `OQS_KEX_code_mcbits_bob'
minimal_kex_oqs.c:(.text.startup+0x16d): undefined reference to `OQS_KEX_code_mcbits_alice_1'
```
